name: Veeder-Root Automatic Tank Gauge (ATG) Administrative Client
author: Jon Hart <jon_hart@rapid7.com>
description:
This module acts as a simplistic administrative client for interfacing
        with Veeder-Root Automatic Tank Gauges (ATGs) or other devices speaking
        the TLS-250 and TLS-350 protocols.  This has been tested against
        GasPot and Conpot, both honeypots meant to simulate ATGs; it has not
        been tested against anything else, so use at your own risk.

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: RHOSTS
options.description: The target host(s), range CIDR identifier, or hosts file with syntax 'file:<path>'

options.name: Proxies
options.description: A proxy chain of format type:host:port[,type:host:port][...]

options.name: ConnectTimeout
options.description: Maximum number of seconds to establish a TCP connection

options.name: TCP::send_delay
options.description: Delays inserted before every send.  (0 = disable)

options.name: THREADS
options.description: The number of concurrent threads (max one per host)

options.name: ShowProgress
options.description: Display progress messages during a scan

options.name: ShowProgressPercent
options.description: The interval in percent that progress should be shown

options.name: TANK_NUMBER
options.description: The tank number to operate on (use with SET_TANK_NAME, 0 to change all)

options.name: TANK_NAME
options.description: The tank name to set (use with SET_TANK_NAME, defaults to random)

options.name: PROTOCOL
options.description: The Veeder-Root TLS protocol to speak (Accepted: TLS-350, TLS-250)

options.name: TIMEOUT
options.description: Time in seconds to wait for responses to our probes
